data.title: Study to Evaluate Real-world Effectiveness With Palbociclib Plus Endocrine Therapy as First-line/Second-line Treatment for HR+/HER2- Advanced Breast Cancer in Japan
data.meta_description: This is a retrospective, multicenter, observational study in Japan by medical record review of advanced breast cancer (ABC) patients who have received palbociclib plus endocrine therapy (ET) as first line or second line setting. For the purposes of this study, analyses will be descriptive in nature. No formal hypothesis testing is planned.
data.text: This is a retrospective, multicenter, observational study in Japan by medical record review of advanced breast cancer (ABC) patients who have received palbociclib plus endocrine therapy (ET) as first line or second line setting. For the purposes of this study, analyses will be descriptive in nature. No formal hypothesis testing is planned.
